Taxi Prices Neumünster – Our Rates

All prices are according to the official tariffs of the city of Neumünster.

Service Price
Base fare €4.60
Price per km up to 6 km €2.30/km
Price per km over 6 km €1.90/km
Waiting time per hour €36.00
